questions.question: Which sentence is correct?
Choose the correct question form:
options: Did you went to the party?
Did you go to the party?
questions.answer: Did you go to the party?

questions.question: Select the correct use of the present perfect:
Choose the correct sentence:
Choose the best word: He’s very ____ about his exam results.
Choose the correct collocation: I’m not very good ____ cooking.
Choose the correct expression: I’m looking forward ____ you soon.
Choose the correct article usage:
What do you say when you don’t understand?
Choose the correct sentence:
Choose the correct sentence.
options: I have visited Paris last year.
I have visit Paris last year.
I was visit Paris last year.

questions.question: Which word is a synonym for 'angry'?
Choose the correct form: 'If I _____ enough money, I would travel the world.'
Which sentence is in the passive voice?
options: Dinner was cooked by the chef.
questions.answer: Dinner was cooked by the chef.

questions.question: Which sentence uses the present perfect tense?
Choose the correct question form.
What is the correct preposition? 'She is afraid ___ spiders.'
Choose the correct sentence.
options: There is too much people here.
There are too much people here.
There are too many people here.
There is too many people here.
questions.answer: There are too many people here.

questions.question: Which sentence shows a first conditional?
options: If it rains, we will cancel the picnic.
If it rained, we would cancel the picnic.
If it had rained, we would have cancelled the picnic.
If it raining, we will cancel the picnic.
questions.answer: If it rains, we will cancel the picnic.

questions.question: Choose the correct phrasal verb: 'She _____ up smoking last year.'
